resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104842</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104842</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202598</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Snap! Crackle! Box!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schnäpper! Knistern! Kasten!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rupture ! Craquement ! Cadre !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pressão! Crackle! Caixa!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schiocco! Crackle! Casella!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θραύση! Κροτάλισμα! Κιβώτιο!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Broche de presión! ¡Crujido! 
¡Rectángulo!</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The student will create a new cereal and design an original box as their final for Art 1. This is a cumulative assignment incorporating the skills and techniques studied and developed throughout the course of the year.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Kursteilnehmer stellt ein neues Getreide her und 
konzipiert einen ursprünglichen Kasten als ihre Endrunde für kunst 
1. Dieses ist eine kumulative Anweisung, welche die Fähigkeiten
und die Techniken studiert werden und entwickelt sind während des 
Kurses des Jahres enthält.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'étudiant créera une nouvelle céréale et concevra un 
cadre initial en tant que leur finale pour l'art 1. C'est une 
affectation cumulative incorporant les qualifications et les 
techniques étudiées et développées au cours de l'année.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O estudante criará um cereal novo e projetará uma caixa 
original como seu final para a arte 1. Esta é uma atribuição 
cumulativa que incorpora as habilidades e as técnicas estudadas e 
desenvolvidas durante todo o curso do ano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'allievo creerà un nuovo cereale e progetterà una 
casella originale come loro finale per l'arte 1. Ciò è 
un'assegnazione cumulativa che comprende le abilità e le tecniche 
studiate e sviluppate attraverso il corso dell'anno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σπουδαστής θα δημιουργήσει νέα δημητριακά και θα 
σχεδιάσει ένα αρχικό κιβώτιο ως τελικό τους για το αρθ. 1. 
Αυτό είναι μια συσσωρευτική ανάθεση που ενσωματώνει τις 
δεξιότητες και τις τεχνικές που μελετώνται και που αναπτύσσονται 
καθ' όλη τη διάρκεια του έτους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El estudiante creará un cereal nuevo y diseñará un 
rectángulo original como su final para el arte 1. Esto es una 
asignación acumulativa que incorpora las habilidades y las técnicas 
estudiadas y desarrolladas a través del curso del año.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:JOAN LANSFORD
FN:JOAN LANSFORD
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:PEGGY PECK
FN:PEGGY PECK
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202598</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104842</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/snap-crackle-box</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
